repairedDockerfile:
# Reference: 
# http://perl-howto.de/2008/06/making-your-own-cpanmini.html 
FROM ubuntu:14.04 
MAINTAINER Michael Mayr <michael@dermitch.de> 

ENV DEBIAN_FRONTEND noninteractive 


RUN apt-get update && apt-get install --no-install-recommends -y libcpan-mini-perl && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*;
RUN mkdir /cpan 

ADD boot.sh /boot.sh 

VOLUME "/cpan" 

CMD ["/boot.sh"]
